original_text: They try to walk in the dark, without any light. He causes them to walk like drunk men. They try to walk in the dark, without any light.
korean_text: 빛 없이 캄캄한 데를 더듬게 하시며 취한 사람 같이 비틀거리게 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: They try to walk in the dark
He causes them to walk like drunk men
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 취한 사람처럼 걷게 하십니다

sentences.original_text: They try to walk in the dark
